mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_SEQ , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PW , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_NICK , A.MEMBER_GRADE , A.MEMBER_HPNUM , A.MEMBER_ADDR , A.MEMBER_GENDER , A.DB_STATUS , A.INPUT_DATE , A.INPUT_ID , A.UPDATE_DATE , A.UPDATE_ID FROM TB_MEMBER A WHERE A.DB_STATUS = 'A' AND A.MEMBER_SEQ = #{MEMBER_SEQ}

SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(MEMBER_SEQ) = 1 THEN 'SUCC' ELSE 'FAIL' END) AS LOGIN_RESULT , A.MEMBER_SEQ , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PW , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_NICK , A.MEMBER_GRADE , A.MEMBER_HPNUM , A.MEMBER_ADDR , A.MEMBER_GENDER , A.DB_STATUS , A.INPUT_DATE , A.INPUT_ID , A.UPDATE_DATE , A.UPDATE_ID FROM TB_MEMBER A WHERE A.DB_STATUS = 'A' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} AND A.MEMBER_PW = #{MEMBER_PW}
